@@ -76,4 +79,87 @@ public long getPos() throws IOException { public boolean seekToNewSource(long targetPos) throws IOException { return false; } + + /** + * Copies some or all bytes from a large (over 2GB) InputStream + * to an OutputStream, optionally skipping input bytes. + *

+ * Copy the method from IOUtils of commons-io to reimplement skip by seek + * rather than read. The reason why IOUtils of commons-io implement skip + * by read can be found at + * IO-203. + *

+ * Copy the method from IOUtils of commons-io to reimplement skip by seek + * rather than read. The reason why IOUtils of commons-io implement skip + * by read can be found at + * IO-203. + *

replies.bodyText: @bharatviswa504 Hi, thanks for your comments.  If length < 0, then bytesToRead equals to bufferLength and never change. So while loop will not break until read == IOUtils.EOF. So it call read entire file till end.
